name: apache-superset
description: Apache Superset is an open-source data visualization and business intelligence platform that allows users to explore, visualize, and analyze data via dashboards and SQL queries. It is cloud-ready and supports plugins and rich visualizations.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Create stunning charts, graphs, and dashboards from your data. Insights at a glance

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Powerful SQL editor for exploring and querying databases. Full SQL capabilities

features.title: Dashboard Builder
features.description: Drag-and-drop interface for creating interactive dashboards. No coding required

features.title: Database Support
features.description: Connect to most SQL databases and data warehouses. Universal compatibility

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with custom visualizations and connectors. Infinitely extensible

features.title: Cloud
features.description: Deploy on-premises or in the cloud with ease. Flexible deployment
